docname: CASE OF GÜL v. SWITZERLAND - [Russian Translation]
externalsources: Convention on social security between Switzerland and Turkey of 1 May 1969
issue: Federal Residence and Settlement of Aliens Act of 26 March 1931, (the RSAA) sections 4, 16, 17 ; Order Limiting the Number of Aliens of 6 October 1986, Articles 13, 36, 38, 39 ; Federal Court judgments, vol. 116 (part. Ib, p. 355), vol. 115 (part. Ib, p. 4), vol. 111 (part. Ib, pp. 163 et seq.) ; Federal Court's unpublished judgment of 6 April 1993
scl: Abdulaziz, Cabales and Balkandali v. the United Kingdom judgment of 28 May 1985, Series A no. 94, pp. 33-34, paras. 67-68;Berrehab v. the Netherlands judgment of 21 June 1988, Series A no. 138, p. 8, para. 7, p. 14, para. 21, pp. 15-16, paras. 28-29;Cruz Varas and Others v.
